module.name: surface_conditions
module.keywords: module, surface condition, surface state, surface treatment
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of surface properties and surface treatment applied to a material. It covers surface characteristics which may be defined by a designer to achieve the required functionality of a part or to satisfy aesthetic requirements.
